New Records: J. Ramirez hit the fastest pitch recorded in MLB history is not accurate. However, J. Ramirez hit his 35th home run of the season in the 8th inning off Bigge, and A. Thomas hit his 12th home run of the season in the 8th inning off Bigge.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The attendance for the game was 31,362.
